START: ^Adelaine: “Hey Mayor! I was talking to the lumber jacks and guess what they found! A sentient and talking tree! How cool is that?! I went on down and talked to it and it seems pretty cool and old. What should we do with it?”
TALK_FRIENDLY: ^The tree appreciates you being kind to it and in return makes the trees in the surrounding area grow faster, boosting the material gain.
CHOP: ^You order the tree to be chopped down and collect the wood before selling it to a wealthy merchant for 500 Gold.
OFFERINGS: ^You give offerings of food to the tree and in return it helps you grow trees nearby to collect.
